note.p: Birth: East Betchworth, Surrey, England (10 May 1693)
Education: School at Enfield under Dr Uvedale; Christ Church, Oxford (matriculated 1712)
Career: Travelled to Italy three times where he amassed a considerable collection of prints and drawings of antiquities; MP for Boston (1730-1734)
Memberships: FSA (1725); Grand Master of Freemasons (1727-1728); Repubblica Lettetaria di Arcadia; Spalding Society; Brasenose Society
Sources: Bulloch's Roll; DNB; GEC; Foster; Sedgwick
Notes: Proposed by Sir Hans Sloane; Roger Gale; John Theophilus Desaguliers
